text: Ayañca dasasahassilokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi appamāṇo ca uḷāro obhāso loke pāturahosi atikkamma devānaṃ devānubhāvanti
edit: Ayañca dasasahassilokadhātu saṅkampi sampakampi sampavedhi appamāṇo ca uḷāro obhāso loke pāturahosi atikkamma devānaṃ devānubhāvanti

translations.transtext: This 10,000-world-system vibrated. Infinite brilliant light appeared in the world, surpassing the divine power of gods.
